00023 class _NullFunctionTracer {
00024     public:
00025         _NullFunctionTracer() {}
00026         _NullFunctionTracer(const void* this_ptr) {}
00027         ~_NullFunctionTracer() {}
00028         void TraceCheckPoint() {}
00029         void StackTrace() {}
00030 
00031         static void TraceNew(const void* linkreg, const void* ptr, UINT16 size) {}
00032         static void TraceDelete(const void* linkreg, const void* ptr) {}
00033         static void TraceMessage(int id, const void* ptr, UINT16 size) {}
00034         static void TraceVersion(const CHAR* str) {}

00047 template<class T>
00048 void TraceDataHelper(InternalTracer::TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg, T* obj) {
00049     InternalTracer::TraceData(mask, linkreg, obj, sizeof(T));
00050 }

00054 template<InternalTracer::TraceMask mask>
00055 class _FunctionTracer {
00056     public:
00057         _FunctionTracer() {
00058             const void* linkreg=0;
00059             #if defined(APOXI_RTOS_NUC32)
00060                 // get linkregister, contains caller address
00061                 #if (__ARMCC_VERSION<200000)
00062                     __asm
00063                     {
00064                         mov linkreg,r14
00065                     }
00066                 #else
00067                     linkreg = (const void*) __return_address();
00068                 #endif
00069             #endif
00070             InternalTracer::TraceFuncBegin(mask, linkreg, 0);
00071         }
00072         
00073         _FunctionTracer(const void* this_ptr) {
00074             const void* linkreg=0;
00075             #if defined(APOXI_RTOS_NUC32)
00076                 // get linkregister, contains caller address
00077                 #if (__ARMCC_VERSION<200000)
00078                     __asm
00079                     {
00080                         mov linkreg,r14
00081                     }
00082                 #else
00083                     linkreg = (const void*) __return_address();
00084                 #endif
00085             #endif
00086             InternalTracer::TraceFuncBegin(mask, linkreg, this_ptr);
00087         }
00088         
00089         ~_FunctionTracer() {

00100                 #endif
00101             #endif

00103         }

00254                 const void* linkreg=0;
00255                 #if defined(APOXI_RTOS_NUC32)
00256                     // get linkregister, contains caller address
00257                 #if (__ARMCC_VERSION<200000)

00261                     }

00263                     linkreg = (const void*) __return_address();
00264                 #endif
00265                 #endif
00266             TraceDataHelper(mask, linkreg, &obj);
00267         }
